cause.description:
This is a cause dedicated to helping the rivers stay healthy and flowing. If you are a person that enjoys the beauty of this natural wonder and the entertainment that it provides then help us to keep these alive. Don't polute the waters or kill the native wildlife. Help trees grow bigger and faster near rivers and streams and do everything possible to keep these wonders flowing.
1. Rivers are the source of life to all creatures
2. They help create a non-destructive source of entertainment
3. Millions of species of animals depend on the habitat created by these natural beauties, keep them alive
cause.mission: Keep all the rivers in the world intact, especially the ones that have runnable sections and make for awesome kayaking spots.
cause.name: Keep the Rivers Flowing
